short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make an article page in Asahi Shimbun Digital extremely simple view, for reading & printing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes any elements other than the body and the images of an article, and enables you to focus on reading the article and to print it out without any inessential elements.

You can use the extension in any web page of Asahi Shimbun, which is located at *.asahi.com such as www.asahi.com or digital.asahi.com.

Asahi Shimbun is a trademark of the Asahi Shimbun Company registered in Japan.
